[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp6ufxjk37[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA stack-buffer-overflow was detected by AddressSanitizer during a fuzzing run of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe Mongoose HTTP library. The overflow occurs in the formatting routines [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, specifically within `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalled via [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static`, `scpy`, and `mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, when handling crafted input [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `mg_http_parse`. The overflow writes one byte past the end of a local buffer on [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe stack.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue: AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte stack-buffer-overflow in [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`. The invalid write occurs in the call chain:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `scpy` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. `mg_vsnprintf` → `mg_snprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m. `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m. `mg_log` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlog.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m. `mg_http_parse` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhttp.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m9[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtest/fuzz.c entry point[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Vulnerability type: stack-based buffer overflow.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Key observations:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • AddressSanitizer pinpoints the overflow at address [0m[1;36m0x[0m[39m…fb78, which lies [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes into the stack frame of `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Two local arrays exist in that frame: `tmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m32[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m72[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m112[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m120[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The write is at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, one byte past the end of `tmp371`.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow occurs during formatting/logging of HTTP data in `mg_http_parse`, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggered by the fuzzing harness.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The crash log includes full stack traces, symbol names, source file paths, and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline numbers.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Affected code areas for investigation:[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • src/mongoose/src/fmt.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfunctions `mg_vxprintf`, `scpy`, related buffer [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdeclarations[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • src/mongoose/src/printf.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfunctions `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static`, `mg_snprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • src/mongoose/src/log.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_log`’s use of snprintf/vxprintf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • src/mongoose/src/http.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_http_parse` handling of formatted logging[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Test harness: src/mongoose/test/fuzz.c [0m[1;39m([0m[39mentry point invoking `mg_http_parse`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m —[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor context on input processing but not root cause.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Analysis [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Analysis Report[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Relevant Code Snippets[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_snippets>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:316[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m328[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:138[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m146[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *dst, size_t dstlen, double d, int width, bool tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[39m:  char buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m140[0m[39m:  int i, s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, e = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  double t, mul, saved;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md == [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"0"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m143[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, d > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"inf"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"-inf"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"nan"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m d = -d, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In mg_vxprintf’s ‘%e’[0m[35m/[0m[39m’%E’ branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/fmt.c lines ~[0m[1;36m316[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m328[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, a local buffer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp` is declared as `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, yet the call `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` passes a dstlen of [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m. This allows `mg_dtoa` → `mg_snprintf` to write up [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes into an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer, leading to the [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte overflow observed by ASan.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Plan[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Align dstlen with the actual buffer size to guarantee `mg_snprintf` never [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrites past `tmp`:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Change the call site:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```diff[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        - k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        + k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - This ensures `dstlen == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m`, so `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand its internal `mg_snprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill cap output to at most [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m characters + NUL, preventing overflow.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m If full precision for negative mantissas is desired, increase the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer size rather than hard-coding dstlen. For example:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m12[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      However, to minimize behavioral changes and satisfy existing tests, using [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with the current `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` is safest.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Logic[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other formatting branches [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., ‘%f’, ‘%g’, integer conversion[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muntouched.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, any future change to the `tmp` array size will [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mautomatically reflect in the `dstlen` passed to `mg_dtoa`, avoiding similar [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmismatches.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Verification Steps[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild the library with AddressSanitizer enabled and rerun the existing fuzz [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness. The stack-buffer-overflow in the `%e` path should no longer trigger.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run the full test suite [0m[1;39m([0m[39munit tests, HTTP parsing tests, fuzz targets[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure no unintended regressions in formatting output.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Side-Effects & Mitigation[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The mantissa string for `%e` might be truncated earlier [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmax [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m characters plus[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNUL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m compared to a [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m-byte allowance. This matches `tmp`’s capacity and is more [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconservative.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If full precision is needed, increasing `tmp`’s size and using `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill restore original formatting width without overflow.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes are made to fuzzer harnesses, logging macros, or external [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdependencies.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Similar Patterns[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In other parts of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., integer conversions via `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode often uses `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to bound `mg_lld` calls. Aligning the `%e` branch [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith that pattern ensures consistency across the formatting logic.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/28/25 00:36:00][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=178860;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=946226;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzing harness triggered an AddressSanitizer report of a stack-buffer-overflow[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the Mongoose library’s formatting code. The overflow occurs in mg_vxprintf [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when writing one byte past a local buffer named `tmp371`. An attempted [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch changed the call to mg_dtoa from using a hard-coded length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, but running the fuzzer again produced an identical overflow at the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame call site.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– When running libFuzzer against the HTTP parser in Mongoose, AddressSanitizer [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreports a one-byte write overflow in the stack frame of mg_vxprintf [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/src/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The crash stack trace shows the overflow originating in mg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m → scpy [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m → mg_vxprintf → mg_dtoa → mg_snprintf → mg_vsnprintf → [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vxprintf.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The sanitizer notes two local buffers in mg_vxprintf:  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `tmp` spanning bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `tmp371` spanning bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  The write occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, just past the end of `tmp371`.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The overflow is reproducible in the function mg_http_parse via a fuzz input [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpassed to LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput in test/fuzz.c.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– In src/fmt.c at the call site [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the original code is:  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The patch replaces the literal `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` with `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, i.e.:  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– This change intends to pass the actual buffer capacity rather than a fixed [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconstant.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult After Patch  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The fuzzer was rerun [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m times on the same input, under identical sanitizer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msettings.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– AddressSanitizer reports the same one-byte stack-buffer-overflow at [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_pfn_iobuf_private, with the same buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the same call chain.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The overflow still occurs at the same offset in the mg_vxprintf frame, indicating[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe patch did not prevent writes beyond `tmp371`.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The definition and allocation of the local buffers in mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mboth `tmp` and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and whether their sizes match worst-case output lengths.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The implementation of mg_dtoa in fmt.c: how it writes digits and decimal points [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto the target buffer, and how it uses the supplied length argument.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The behavior of the scpy helper in fmt.c: how it copies strings into the output [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcallback and whether it accounts for buffer boundaries.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– The out-of-bounds write site in mg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m as used by scpy. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mUnderstanding its buffer management may reveal inconsistencies between buffer sizes[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand write lengths.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m– Overall interactions between mg_vxprintf, mg_snprintf, mg_vsnprintf, and the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minternal iobuf routines in printf.c, to ensure all length parameters and buffer [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcapacities are correctly propagated.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNo root-cause speculation or remediation suggestions are included; this report [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfocuses on reproducing the issue, describing the patch attempt, and identifying [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode regions requiring deeper review.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m207[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool is_signed, bool is_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m208[0m[39m:  const char *letters = [0m[32m"0123456789abcdef"[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root-Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte stack-buffer-overflow in the small local[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m inside `mg_vxprintf`’s `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The helper `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int64_t val, bool, bool[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` writes digits without [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39many bounds checking, so writing an exponent whose textual length exceeds [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mincluding sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m overruns `tmp371`.  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The previous patch fixed the mantissa buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m by passing its true size [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto `mg_dtoa`, but did not address the unbounded writes performed by `mg_lld` into[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte array.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Preserve Existing Logic[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must not change the public API or harness, or remove functionality.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `mg_lld` must continue to produce the full, untruncated integer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrepresentation.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other format specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%d`, `%u`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m already use the larger buffer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so we must avoid regressing those.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Outline[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. In `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting branch within `mg_vxprintf`. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIt will look roughly like:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[33m...[0m[39m compute mantissa [0m[33m...[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, pr, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        n++;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char tmp2[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;               [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m <-- too small[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp2, exponent, true, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp2, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        n++;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        continue;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Change the small [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte array to match the larger, already-proven safe size [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. For clarity, rename it to `tmp2` or `exp_buf`:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```diff[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        char tmp2[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Leave the `mg_lld` call unmodified; it will now always write into a [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msufficiently large buffer.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Adjust the subsequent call to `scpy` to use `exp_buf`:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```diff[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp2, exponent, true, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp2, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexp_buf, exponent, true, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, exp_buf, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   e. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional hardening[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Later, consider refactoring `mg_lld` to accept a [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`buflen` parameter and clamp/truncate or error if the value’s textual form exceeds [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe buffer. For now, the increased buffer size addresses the immediate overflow.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By increasing the exponent buffer to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe same as the general numeric[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, we guarantee that any realistic exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding sign and digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfit without overwriting the stack frame.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We preserve all existing formatting logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwe do not truncate exponents[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No harness or external libraries are modified.  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack usage increases by [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes in that branch—negligible for typical [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplications.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Existing tests and fuzzing targets continue to operate identically, except the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprevious ASan failure is resolved.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Verification[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild Mongoose, rerun libFuzzer for [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m+ iterations on the problematic input[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munder ASan.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm that the stack-buffer-overflow no longer reproduces and that no new [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mASan or UBSan errors are introduced.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run the full test suite to ensure no regressions in other formatters.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/28/25 00:40:41][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=797791;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=504606;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m3[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m[12/28/25 00:41:46][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.ANALYZE -> TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m                     ]8;id=23628;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=962522;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m[12/28/25 00:42:13][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m -> TeamStatus.EVALUATE                    ]8;id=964330;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=92267;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m3[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Setting owner[1m)[0m Started[33m...[0m                       ]8;id=366618;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=658973;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#9\[2m9[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Setting owner[1m)[0m Took [1;36m0.53[0m seconds;              ]8;id=890218;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=92683;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#23\[2m23[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m                                                               [2m                      [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp6ufxjk37[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-detected stack-buffer-overflow in the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMongoose codebase, triggered during fuzz testing. The overflow occurs in [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalled from `mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when writing past the end of a [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msmall stack buffer named `tmp371` in `fmt.c`.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempt modifies the formatting logic in `fmt.[0m[1;92mc:319[0m[39m` by:[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Passing the actual buffer size to `mg_dtoa`.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Moving exponent formatting into a separate local array `exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` using [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld`.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Removing the original exponent handling on the small `tmp` array.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the same stack-buffer-overflow report reoccurs at the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame location [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371` in `mg_vxprintf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, indicating the patch did not eliminate [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe overflow.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzer run with AddressSanitizer reports a one-byte write overflow on a stack [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Overflow is in frame of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, specifically[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwriting to address offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, which lies just beyond the declared size of the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocal buffer `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Call chain: `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → `mg_http_parse` → `mg_log` → `mg_vxprintf`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m→ `scpy` → `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The problematic buffer lives in `mg_vxprintf` around line [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m and is used to hold[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatted floating-point or integer components.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mImportant Observations  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Two local buffers exist in the `mg_vxprintf` frame:  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  * `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat offsets [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  * `char tmp371[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat offsets [0m[1;36m112[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow happens exactly at the boundary of `tmp371`, indicating an [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moff-by-one or underestimated buffer length.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The sanitizer report persists even after adjusting calls into `mg_dtoa` and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintroducing a new `exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Original code at `fmt.[0m[1;92mc:319[0m[39m` used:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n++;[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Patched code:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n++;[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexp_buf, exponent, true, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, exp_buf, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'%'[0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    n++;[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Patch result logs show the ASan error unchanged:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  * Same write at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the same stack frame.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  * Same stack layout and buffer sizes in the shadow memory dump.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The definition and capacity of the [0m[1;35mbuffer[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m used in `mg_vxprintf`, especially [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The internal implementations of `mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`, and `scpy` to understand how[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmany bytes they may write under various formatting flags.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The calling pattern in `mg_vxprintf` around line [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m and the growth of the format[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer when handling floating-point and exponent notation.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any other format specifiers or code paths in `fmt.c` that rely on fixed-size [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack buffers for numeric conversions.  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOverall, the overflow remains in the formatting logic in `fmt.c`, and buffer sizing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min that area should be reviewed in full to prevent writes beyond the declared stack[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstorage.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_snippets>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:318[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m326[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
