[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:229[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m234[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m229[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *ptr, char *buf,[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m230[0m[39m:                          size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m231[0m[39m:  size_t i = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m232[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi < len && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m != [0m[32m'\0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m233[0m[39m:  return i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m234[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:107[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m117[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int e, int sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:  int n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m110[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sign;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me > [0m[1;36m400[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me < [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m113[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me >= [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, e -= [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m114[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me >= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, e -= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m115[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m116[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m117[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Root Cause Analysis and Core Insight**  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The stack overflow happens in the `%e` formatting branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A tiny [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is used both for the mantissa [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and for the exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **`mg_dtoa`** can emit up to [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor more under unusual rounding[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfeeding it an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer with a “[0m[33mmaxlen[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m” overruns.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **`mg_lld`** never NUL-terminates its output and can also write more than [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes for large exponents; then `scpy` reads beyond the buffer until it finds a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mzero somewhere on the stack.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The last patch only changed the length passed to `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`→`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`==[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and moved the exponent conversion into a new [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marray—but it still used the wrong buffers and even printed `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Preserve Existing Logic**  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must continue using `mg_dtoa` for the mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[33mprecision[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, scientific [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnotation flag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must still output `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi.e. the literal `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m between mantissa and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must still iterate each character via `scpy`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We cannot touch any fuzz-harness code or tests; only `src/fmt.c` in the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcodebase.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Comprehensive Patch Outline**  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. **Remove the tiny `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`** from the `%e` branch; reuse the existing [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarger mantissa buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, declared earlier in the function[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfloating-point conversion.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. **Declare an exponent buffer** of safe size [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, sufficient [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor “e±###” [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmax [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plus headroom.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. **Mantissa formatting**  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Call `mg_dtoa` into the [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer:  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t k1 = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m[33mscientific[0m[39m=*[0m[35m/[0m[95mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   D. **Print the specifier**  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Emit the literal `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m` via `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; n++;`  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   E. **Exponent formatting via `addexp`**  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Compute `abs_exp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? -exponent : exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Choose sign character: `sign_char = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m : [0m[32m'+'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Call the small, fixed-length helper:  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t k2 = [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexp_buf, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mabs_exp, sign_char[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, exp_buf, k2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   F. **Eliminate** all uses of `mg_lld` and any stray `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in this branch.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Why This Fix Works**  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **No more [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte overflows**: Mantissa goes into a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer; exponent [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto a [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m-byte buffer that comfortably holds up to “e-[0m[1;36m999[0m[39m”.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **`addexp` is bounded**: It emits at most [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[32m"e±ddd"[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, returns the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexact length, and is followed by an exact-length `scpy`.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Preserves behavior**: Mantissa is still printed with [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits after the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdecimal, then the lowercase `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`, then the signed exponent.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Zero performance impact** outside this branch: All other format specifiers [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `mg_vxprintf` remain untouched.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Step-by-Step Implementation**  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Open `src/fmt.c` and locate the `%e` branch around line [0m[1;36m318[0m[39m.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Remove or comment out:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - The old `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` call [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwill be replaced by `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - The `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` call.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Any stray `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in that branch.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. In place, insert:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* %e scientific notation *[0m[35m/[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      int exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Mantissa into existing [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer *[0m[35m/[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      size_t k1 = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m[33mscientific[0m[39m=*[0m[35m/[0m[95mtrue[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m The [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m specifier *[0m[35m/[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      n++;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Exponent via bounded helper *[0m[35m/[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        int abs_e = exponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? -exponent : exponent;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        char sign_char = exponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m : [0m[32m'+'[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        size_t k2 = [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexp_buf, abs_e, sign_char[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, exp_buf, k2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Rebuild and rerun the fuzzer under AddressSanitizer; confirm no more [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow in `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Potential Side-Effects & Mitigation**  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Edge-case exponents >[0m[1;36m999[0m[39m**: `addexp` returns zero if `e>[0m[1;36m400[0m[39m`, but this [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmatches its existing behavior. We did not enlarge that logic.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Upper-case `%E`** is still unhandled by this patch; if needed later, a [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msymmetric branch can be added.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Maintain code style**: All variable names [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`, `exp_buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m follow existing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatterns.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. **Conclusion**  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This strategy safely eliminates the off-by-one and under-sized buffer overflows [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mby [0m[1;39m([0m[39ma[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m giving each formatting step its own appropriately sized buffer, and [0m[1;39m([0m[39mb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mleveraging the existing, bounded `addexp` helper for exponent output. No harness [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchanges, no broad exception swallowing, and existing functionality is fully [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpreserved.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/28/25 00:42:42][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=264233;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=990384;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m[12/28/25 00:45:50][0m[2;36m [0m[1;31mERROR   [0m PoV found:                                                                           ]8;id=200778;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/evaluator/services/default/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=207717;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/evaluator/services/default/__init__.py#102\[2m102[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         - Stdout:                                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mFUZZER[0m=[35mfuzz[0m                                                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + shift                                                                              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m [32m'!'[0m -v TESTCASE [32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                            [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mTESTCASE[0m=[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                 [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m [32m'!'[0m -f [35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m [32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + export [33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m=[35minteractive[0m                                                 [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mRUN_FUZZER_MODE[0m=[35minteractive[0m                                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + export [33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m=[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                    [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-detected stack-buffer-overflow in the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMongoose formatting library. A fuzz test exercising the `%e` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mscientific notation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler in `mg_vxprintf` writes one byte past the end of a local stack buffer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, triggering an overflow in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` via `scpy`. The patch [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempt replaces the original `%e` branch—removing the fixed small buffer, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintroducing a scoped block with calls to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,…[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, emitting [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ‘e’ specifier, and formatting the exponent into a new `exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` via an [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`addexp` helper. After applying the patch, the same fuzz input still produces an [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical stack-buffer-overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the same frame, indicating the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow remains.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A fuzzing run on `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `test/fuzz.c` invokes [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_http_parse`, which logs formatted output via `mg_vxprintf` and related [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions in `src/fmt.c` and `src/printf.c`.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write overflow in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mthe low-level output helper[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, called from `scpy`, called from [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow address is at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the stack frame of `mg_vxprintf` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39msource line [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m of `fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, overflowing the second local buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdeclared at lines around [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack variables in that frame:  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp` occupies bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp371` occupies bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The write to address ending in offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m crosses the boundary of `tmp371`, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating insufficient buffer space for the formatted exponent or mantissa in the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%e` case.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The developer replaces the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch starting at line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m of [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/fmt.c`:  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Removes `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` and expands formatting steps into a nested block.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Uses an existing buffer `tmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize inferred from outer scope[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m but passes [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mits `sizeof`.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Calls `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, true[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, then outputs mantissa.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Emits the literal format character `c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m via `[0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Introduces a new `char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, computes absolute exponent and sign, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformats it via `addexp`, and outputs via `scpy`.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All calls to `scpy` now use explicit length values returned by the formatting [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhelpers.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Result  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After rebuilding and rerunning the same fuzz test, AddressSanitizer still [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreports a stack-buffer-overflow at the same location and offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The error stack trace remains identical: overflow in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` → [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy` → `mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m`.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The local buffers `tmp` and `tmp371` in `mg_vxprintf` are still being [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflowed, despite using a separate `exp_buf` in the inner block.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The declaration and sizing of local buffers in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m247[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m in `src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, specifically the sizes of `tmp` and `tmp371`.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The implementation of `scpy` in `src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:233[0m[39m`, and how it writes into the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutput buffer via `out`.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The relationship between the `len` parameters passed to `scpy` and the actual [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer capacities in the caller.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The behavior of `mg_dtoa` and `addexp` helpers: whether they can return [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlengths larger than expected.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The calling context in `mg_log`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`mg_http_parse` to confirm no additional [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting directives or parameter combinations lead to larger output than buffers [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallow.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Overall formatting logic in `fmt.c`, including fallback cases and [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwidth/precision handling that may further impact buffer usage.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:318[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m326[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:316[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m328[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m328[0m[39m:    [0m[39m  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `%e` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mscientific[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m branch in `mg_vxprintf` uses a tiny `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` to [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhold first the mantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia `mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and then the exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia `mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, exponent, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is unbounded and can write arbitrarily many digits [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto its `buf` argument. When `buf` is only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes, large exponents overflow the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack slot [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, corrupt the frame, and subsequently misdirect the output [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcallback, triggering ASan-reported overflows in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The last patch attempted to offload exponent formatting into a larger local [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m16[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, but that code never made use of a safe mantissa buffer in scope, and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlikely did not eliminate the original `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` or rebinding of `tmp` properly. As a[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresult, the overflow persisted.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Fix Outline  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Eliminate **all** uses of `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and `mg_lld` in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Introduce two properly sized, stack‐local buffers in that branch:  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `char mant_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` – at least as large as the existing `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` used [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39melsewhere, to hold the mantissa string safely.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  – sufficient to hold a C99‐style exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`e±ddd`, at[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmost [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m chars[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plus a NUL if desired.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Use the existing, bounded `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to write the mantissa [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto `mant_buf`, passing `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmant_buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for safety.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   D. Format the exponent via the existing `[0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexp_buf, abs_e, sign_char[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhelper [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich writes at most [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, then emit exactly `k2` bytes from `exp_buf` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39musing `scpy`.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   E. Remove any lingering calls to `mg_lld` in this branch. This prevents any [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munbounded writes into small stack buffers.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   F. Retain all existing width [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`w`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and precision [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pr`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m logic around mantissa [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39moptionally defaulting `pr` to [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m when unspecified, to mirror the `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut do **not** attempt to re‐enforce width/pad/exponent interactions more than [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstrictly needed to fix the overflow.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Steps  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` handler in `src/fmt.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m318[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Remove lines roughly from the opening of that branch:  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     n++;[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replace them with:  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* %e [0m[35m/[0m[39m %E: scientific notation, safe  buffer sizes *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       int exponent_int = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent_int[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Mantissa in a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer *[0m[35m/[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char mant_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t pr_e = pr == ~0U ? [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m : pr;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m default precision [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m if not specified[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t k1 = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmant_buf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmant_buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr_e, c == [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, mant_buf, k1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Emit [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m or [0m[32m'E'[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n++;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Exponent in a small [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer via bounded helper *[0m[35m/[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       int abs_e = exponent_int < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? -exponent_int : exponent_int;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       char sign_char = exponent_int < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m : [0m[32m'+'[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t k2 = [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexp_buf, abs_e, sign_char[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m writes ≤[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, exp_buf, k2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Leave the rest of the formatting logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwidth-based padding, left/right [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mjustification, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m unchanged.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification & Preservation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By **never** calling `mg_lld` on a fixed‐size [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m byte buffer, we completely [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meliminate the root cause of the stack corruption.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Using `mant_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` mirrors the existing capacity for floating‐point [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting in the `[0m[32m'g'[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[32m'f'[0m[39m` branch, preserving mantissa behavior and precision.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` is more than enough for any double’s exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mup to three digits[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mplus sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and `addexp` is already guaranteed to write at most [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bytes.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We do not modify any external APIs, harness code, or test code; we only change[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe library’s `%e` logic.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This patch is minimal and surgical, avoids any broad exception masking, and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mretains all existing padding, width, and precision support.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No tests should break—existing fuzz harnesses that trigger large exponents [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill now safely truncate to the small `exp_buf` and never overflow the frame.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects & Mitigations  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Behavior is nearly identical for small exponents; for extremely large [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponents [0m[1;39m([0m[39m>[0m[1;36m999[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, this will wrap the hundreds digit modulo [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mas per current [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`addexp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, preserving the minimal C99 requirement of at least [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m digits. This [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmatches the library’s existing behavior for `%e`.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Total output length for very large scientific‐notation values is now bounded: [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa [0m[1;39m([0m[39m≤[0m[1;36m39[0m[39m chars[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m + exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39m≤[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = ≤[0m[1;36m44[0m[39m chars, eliminating unbounded growth.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No impact on other format specifiers.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:316[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m328[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
