[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a reproducible [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte stack buffer overflow detected by [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer in the function `mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, called through [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` in `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`. The overflow occurs when formatting [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfloating-point values in scientific notation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, overrunning a small local[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m on the stack.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempt replaces the fixed small buffer logic for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` with larger, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtwo-stage heap buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mant_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and `exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and auxiliary formatting [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mroutines. After applying the patch, the same sanitizer error—overflow of the same [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371` stack slot in `mg_vxprintf`—still occurs on another test input, indicating[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe overflow remains.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Error type**: AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte stack-buffer-overflow.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Location**:  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Faulting instruction at `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` in `src/mongoose/src/printf.c`. [0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The overflow writes one byte past `tmp371`.[0m                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Fuzzer input triggers `mg_http_parse` → `mg_log` → `[0m[1;35mmg_vxprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"%e"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` path.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Sanitizer output shows the buffer overflow in the scientific notation branch.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Changes** [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/fmt.c`, around `mg_vxprintf` line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Replace original small-buffer `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` code block:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```c[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[33m...[0m[39m old logic [0m[33m...[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Introduce a scoped block:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Compute `exponent_int` via `log10`.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Allocate `char mant_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Call `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmant_buf, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmant_buf[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, pr_e, [0m[33mc[0m[39m==[0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Emit the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` specifier.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Allocate `char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Call helper `[0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexp_buf, abs_e, sign_char[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to format exponent.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Use `scpy` to copy both buffers into the I/O buffer.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Intent**: eliminate small statically allocated `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and manage sizes [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafely.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-patch Result[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The same AddressSanitizer error recurs, pointing again at the same overflow in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write overflows `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe untouched [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte stack array[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Same call stack, same redzone violation.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This indicates that although the `%e` path was rewritten, another code path or [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mresidual local buffer in `mg_vxprintf` still overruns its stack slot.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Investigation Points[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo fully understand and resolve the overflow, the following code areas should be [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreviewed:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **mg_vxprintf stack layout**  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Examine all local buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `tmp`, `tmp371`, or others[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and their maximum[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrite lengths.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Trace every formatting specifier [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%d`, `%f`, `%e`, `%s`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to ensure [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer bounds.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **scpy implementation**  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Understand how `[0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, buf, len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` writes characters via [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Check whether `scpy` or `out` callbacks assume a fixed-size local buffer.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **mg_dtoa and addexp helpers**  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm they do not write past the provided buffer sizes.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Verify format width/precision logic against buffer capacities.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **mg_pfn_iobuf_private in printf.c**  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensure its logic handles arbitrary lengths correctly and does not rely on [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcaller’s stack buffers.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Other formatting branches**  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%G`, integer formatting, and padding logic may similarly use small [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtemporaries.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA holistic review of `mg_vxprintf` and its helper functions in [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/mongoose/src/fmt.c` and `printf.c` is needed to identify and correct all [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-allocated buffers that can be overflowed by adversarial input.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m110[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sign;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me > [0m[1;36m400[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me < [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m113[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me >= [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, e -= [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m114[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me >= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, e -= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m * [0m[1;39m([0m[39me [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m115[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39me + [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m116[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:271[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m281[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m271[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'p'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, is_long = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m272[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'd'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'u'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'x'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'X'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'p'[0m[39m ||[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m273[0m[39m:          c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'f'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m274[0m[39m:        bool s = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'd'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, h = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'x'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'X'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'p'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m275[0m[39m:        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m276[0m[39m:        size_t xl = x ? [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m : [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m277[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'g'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'f'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m278[0m[39m:          double v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m279[0m[39m:          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m280[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, v, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr, c == [0m[32m'g'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m281[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_long == [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:138[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m146[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *dst, size_t dstlen, double d, int width, bool tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[39m:  char buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m140[0m[39m:  int i, s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, e = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  double t, mul, saved;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md == [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"0"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m143[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, d > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"inf"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"-inf"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"nan"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m d = -d, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:229[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m234[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m229[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *ptr, char *buf,[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m230[0m[39m:                          size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m231[0m[39m:  size_t i = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m232[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi < len && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m != [0m[32m'\0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m233[0m[39m:  return i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m234[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m325[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m315[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; minus && pr < w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m316[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m[39m:          double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The AddressSanitizer error pinpoints a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write just past an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte stack [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer, noted as `tmp371[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, although we removed[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe original `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`, we introduced `char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`. On the stack this [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccupies the same slot.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow thus now occurs in `[0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexp_buf, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, which unconditionally [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrites at least two bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m` and sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, then potentially up to five digits.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn a worst-case exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., three or more digits plus sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, it can write [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmore bytes; with an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffer it barely fits, but compiler alignment and [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredzones show a one-byte overrun, likely from either a four-digit exponent or from [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe two-byte preamble plus three digits plus null [0m[1;39m([0m[39mif the code ever emits a `[0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m`,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor if integer divisions in `addexp` sequence write more than expected[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Moreover, the call to `mg_dtoa` in the `%e` branch still uses a two-stage [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapproach: the mantissa buffer `mant_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msafe[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m then emits the literal [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifier [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m then `exp_buf`. But the overall stack layout shows these locals [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimmediately adjacent; even a correct `addexp` can leave no redzone for the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompiler’s stack frame alignment.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strategy to Eliminate the Overflow[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Increase `exp_buf` to at least [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes. This guarantees space for:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, sign [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - up to [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m digits [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmax exponent e.g. “+[0m[1;36m400[0m[39m”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m,[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - optional leading zero for single-digit exponents [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - a terminating null if any helper inserts it [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - leaving margin for compiler redzones.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Alternatively, allocate a single contiguous buffer for the entire [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent+mantissa, matching the safe `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` pattern used by `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f`. But [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msince we already isolate mantissa vs. exponent, it is simplest to:[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Change `char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` → `char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Update all calls to `addexp` accordingly [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno other code depends on exactly [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Verify `addexp` never writes more than [0m[1;36m9[0m[39m characters [0m[1;39m([0m[39mit writes at most [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39msign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + up to [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m digits + optional leading zero = ≤ [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, plus a null if [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minserted[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Ten bytes is a safe upper bound preserving redzone.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Run full regression with AddressSanitizer to confirm no further redzone [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mviolations in `mg_vxprintf`.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Implementation Steps[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch in `mg_vxprintf`.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change the declaration from:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       `char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     to:[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       `char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Leave the rest of the code in that branch unchanged [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmantissa logic, `mg_dtoa`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39musage, `addexp`, `scpy` calls[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No other patches to harness or external libraries are needed.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild and confirm that:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - The stack frame redzones show no overflow at the `exp_buf` slot.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - All existing unit tests and fuzz harnesses pass.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Increasing `exp_buf` from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m bytes directly addresses the off-by-one [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moff-by-few[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m overflow by giving margin for the emitted characters and any internal [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpadding/nulls.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This follows the same “use a larger fixed buffer” approach already proven safe[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It preserves the existing logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtwo-stage formatting[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and does not alter any [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother formatting or fuzzing behavior.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Externally visible behavior is unchanged: scientific notation strings remain [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical to before.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other formatting branches remain untouched and continue using their original [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafe buffers.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects & Mitigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A larger stack footprint in `mg_vxprintf` by [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m bytes is negligible.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No new dependencies are introduced.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If future exponents exceed three digits [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., e>[0m[1;36m9999[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, `addexp` itself caps [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat `e>[0m[1;36m400[0m[39m` and returns [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, so no further growth is expected.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer will now confirm the overflow is resolved.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Similar Patterns[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch uses a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte stack buffer for all floating formats; [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhere we align the exponent buffer size with that practice [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi.e., proactively [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moversize small temporaries[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No other code in `mg_vxprintf` uses [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte buffers for dynamic content after [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis change.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Should additional formatting specifiers require similar fixes [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `%G`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same principle applies.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m325[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_change>[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--- a/src/fmt.c[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+++ b/src/fmt.c[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-              char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+              [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Exponent buffer: enlarged to avoid stack overflow *[0m[35m/[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+              char exp_buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m               int abs_e = exponent_int < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? -exponent_int : exponent_int;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m               char sign_char = exponent_int < [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m : [0m[32m'+'[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m               size_t k2 = [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mexp_buf, abs_e, sign_char[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m               n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, exp_buf, k2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_change[0m[39m>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
